SELECT a.id, a.`name`,a.author,a.cover,a.introduction FROM book a WHERE INSTR(a.sort,#{topSort})>0 ORDER BY a.number DESC LIMIT 0,#{num}
SELECT user_id FROM book b,comment c WHERE b.id=#{id} AND b.id=c.target_id
mapper.update: UPDATE tag SET female_number = female_number + #{num} WHERE INSTR( (SELECT book.sort FROM book WHERE id = #{id}),tag.sort)>0
mapper.select: SELECT sort FROM tag t ORDER BY t.female_number DESC LIMIT 1
